TopicTitle: Grab KSP as a Steam Summer Sale Daily Deal for 40% Off!

Articles.Content:
<p><a href="http://bit.ly/1nzHK9h"><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/07861342a1fb7f89742e1aa78e32c264/tumblr_inline_n7qv5gvLGv1rr2wit.png"/></a></p>

<p><span>You won’t regret grabbing <em>Kerbal Space Program</em> for 40% off as a daily deal in Steam’s <a href="http://bit.ly/1nzHK9h"><strong>SUMMER SALE</strong></a>! There’s only a limited time to get your claws in there, so if you or someone you know is looking for a fix of <em>KSP</em>, now’s the time!</span></p>

<p><iframe frameborder="0" height="315" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/17XveO-u6cs" width="420"></iframe></p>
It will be so painful for those who just brought it with 25% off...
As did I... well, no matter as long as the money goes to the developer.
